hopobject.name: Page
hopobject.body: Where do you live? zovirax reddit But nothing stays the same for very long, nowadays. And no sooner has Netflix established itself in the UK (though there’s still a long, long way to go in terms of brand awareness) than along comes Spanish-based Wuaki.tv, with its permanently discounted package and the ability to buy new TV and film releases in one place. The advantage: sites that actually sell films and TV shows are allowed to showcase them by studios much sooner than those who offer rental-only opportunities, like Netflix (where new releases can take up to a year to appear). And though their fees are still diddly-squat compared to the established UK TV subscription services, Netflix charges £5.99 and LoveFilm’s £4.99 for unlimited streaming. On their site, Wuaki promise ‘50% off for life’ – bringing it down £2.99, and driving home the price differential.
